medium: Mahogany with satinwood and mahogany inlay
title: Knife box, one of a pair
description: knife-boxes, pair of; Sheraton style, serpentine fronts; slanting tops; small silver key plates and pulls. Interior narrow band of satinwood and mahogany inlay follows outline of top, and encloses each opening
creditline: Gift of James. F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
